summary: Compose builds a sequential pipeline of callables that process data items, supporting both single-array/tensor inputs and dictionary-based inputs with pass‑through semantics. It can automatically apply each transform to every element of a list, optionally unpack arguments, log execution, enforce deterministic randomness, and optionally perform lazy resampling to minimise repeated spatial operations. Overrides allow runtime parameter injection for compatible transforms.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, reproducible and performance‑aware way to compose preprocessing and augmentation steps for medical imaging (or similar) data, simplifying pipeline definition and execution while supporting deterministic behavior and lazy resampling.
